script: Get-Content "$dir\file_id.diz"
New-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you" -ItemType Directory

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\01 nemo - inner workings (zamuz's a pair of dimensions remix).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\04 framesofreality - irracional (skupers' koh-i stream).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\15 skupers - dubbing single mothers (amphirion's second take).avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you"
Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\16 amphirion - heaven scent.avs" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\avsres_texer_circle_sharp_25x25.bmp" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"

Copy-Item -Force "$dir\avs\v4_texer7.bmp" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"

Write Host ""; Write-Warning "
This installer wants to install selected APEs required by the presets in the pack. However, if you prefer to keep your locally installed versions, please skip the following step."
Copy-Item -Confirm -Force "$dir\avs\*.ape" "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\01 nemo - inner workings (zamuz's a pair of dimensions remix).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\02 amphirion - vector my art.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\03 pure-krypton - i broke my frame (da naughty's re-rub).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\04 framesofreality - irracional (skupers' koh-i stream).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\05 yathosho - vogue.avs"

Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\08 zamuz - bones.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\09 les Noobiens - min syster lider av psykisk ohälsa.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\10 skupers - electronique.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\11 nemo - over the hills.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\12 yathosho - interieur (ya-tho-sho rework).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\13 zamuz - a strike full of luck.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\14 nemo - surfacing 8 (yathosho's facing mod rework).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\15 skupers - dubbing single mothers (amphirion's second take).avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\16 amphirion - heaven scent.avs"
Remove-Item -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you\17 nemo - habitat.avs"
Remove-Item -Confirm -Recurse -Force "$(appdir winamp $global)\current\Plugins\avs\VISBOT\VC007 Meat to please you"
